description: Presents final decision in clear, empathetic language to customers

result.decision_summary: We have carefully reviewed your dispute and, unfortunately, are unable to approve your request at this time.
result.detailed_explanation: We understand how important this matter is to you. After thoroughly examining the details you provided and reviewing the relevant documentation, we determined that your claim does not meet the eligibility criteria for a refund under our current policy. Specifically, the issue raised does not fall within the types of incidents that are covered.

policy_references.customer_friendly_explanation: Our policy covers refunds in cases where products are defective or services were not delivered as described. Disputes related to buyer's remorse or change of mind are not eligible for refunds.

next_steps.action: Review the denial details provided above and gather any additional evidence if you feel your case qualifies.
If you wish to appeal this decision, follow the appeal instructions below.

appeal_options.appeal_instructions: You may appeal by submitting a written request to our support team, including any new information or supporting documents you believe may impact the decision.
